column4: Every time I run that, firefox gets downloaded but not installed. And I get the same errors
I'm searching for a deb package for an x86 version of firefox 8, but I can't find one.
I think if I could get that, it would save me from having to fix the broken package manager
But I apt still won't install the latest firefox
done that. It runs, dowloads firefox, but doesn't install it.
10.04 is lts not  10.10 abd we are at 11.10 now
updating isn't really an option with a broken package management system.
non lts only have a 6 moth life cycle
depends on the isp yuors might have the isos on there site free of charge
